name: Dead Dating - Your Gay Summer Horror Bromance
name_original: Dead Dating - Your Gay Summer Horror Bromance
description:
A romantic summer date party gone wild! A sweet party becomes a murder scene...

you have to find a way to survive in an isolated mansion on an isolated island with ten guys! Can you rescue your lover and catch the killer?

FEATURES
  • 5+1 Episodes & 3 DLCs
  • 10+1 characters
  • Customizable Player Character
  • Various boy costumes
  • Multi-line plot and multiple endings
  • Relationship system
  • Character events achievement
  • Clue collection
  • Item collections
  • 3D clues
  • Look-back mode
  • Eye of Truth
  • Auto mode
My Patreon is open now, If you want to support my project, you can click the button below. and you can get my hi-resolution Artworks there. :)
